title: Pangram for Dr. King
content: M. L. King Jr. expressed belief in equality with amazing conviction.
author: eliason

comments.content: I share his conviction, but then again, it is easy for me, because I'm white. And live in Europe. In a country that had nothing to do with slave trade.

I had not seen this topic.  
I don't know if this is it right place to thank.  
I do not fully accustomed to typophyle..  
but tanks eliason.
